website_summaries.verdict: With the Asics GT Xpress, many runners felt their performance was exceptional while still feeling cozy and comfortable. The various positive reviews from consumers praised all the components of the shoe – from structure to appearance to wear experience. Overall, the GT Xpress has fruitfully wowed the market with its reliability and functionality.
pros: The Asics GT Xpress was a comfortable running shoe, according to many users
Others mentioned that the shoe did not require a break-in period because it felt comfortable right from the start
Several users agreed that the shoe had a stylish and modern appearance
One reviewer shared that the toe box gave plenty of room
The GT Xpress provided a stable ride all throughout the run, said a buyer
The shoe helped with shin splints and other pains, according to a satisfied runner
cons: The support and cushioning were gone after only a month of usage, a user complained

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 6 months ago. I do delivery work and on average work 11 hour days, 5-6 days a week. The shoe is lightweight and comfortable. They fit really well as I also replaced the inserts with an arch orthotic. The upper fared pretty well, but the soles wore down to the foam. That being said, this shoe has lasted a lot longer than the Nike and Saucony that I have worn for this type of work. I also realize that it is a running shoe and not a work shoe. That being said, I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Use these to referee basketball and loved them so much I bought a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Chad Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Small for me
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10D and my toes ddin't like their new home. They felt like they weren't long enough. Maybe a 10.5 would have worked in this particular sneaker for me. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A

customer_reviews.title: Asics are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: In short these shoes are great! Who doesnt LOVE a good quality shoe? We bought these as a return to school attire. Our boys love the style, the color and feel. We would buy again, absolutely! Asics is a great product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMySevenLittles-Az

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wore Asics my entire running years and Gel-Kayano's were my model of choice. Now I'm a walker and can't justify a $150 running shoe so I thought I'd try this model at essentially half the price. I am glad I did, their lighter but have more then enough cushioning for my 5 mile walks. I don't know how much bounce on heel strike you'd get on a run compared with the higher end models or how much sooner it might breakdown, nut these are quite nice for the money. I understand their now discontinued, I would have bought another pair if I knew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible . It’ll like having hard plastic soles. Very uncomfortable and would not ever consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K.

customer_reviews.title: I miss the old Asics
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a huge fan of ASICS shoes, so I was very excited to find this pair at a great price. Unfortunately, these were extremely uncomfortable for the first several weeks wearing them. Eventually after broken in they were decent. They have held up fairly well, as I have had them for approximately 7 months now and wear them more day than not now. Unfortunately I will probably be moving to another product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: T C R

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe with good support. Comfortable. At this price...I bought several.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Running/exercise shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these to run about 4x per week. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight running shoe with adequate support. I've had five knee operations and this shoe works for me like no other.
customer_reviews.author: pdg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitting shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoes. We've had 4 or so pairs and find they fit him better than most of the other brands we've bought over the years.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size larger and I should not because it is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: davit8012

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price. You can spend much more and not get a better shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and fit to my foot. The arch support could be enhanced/improved. Excellent heel and ball cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good value...
customer_reviews.text: I run 18 - 24 miles a week. Have used these for four months expect to get six months use.
customer_reviews.author: Animalhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I normally wear a size 11 dress shoe but a size 12 fits perfect in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I am usually a 13 (sometimes 12) 13 was perfect.  Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: For $45 this is a shoe well worth the dollars. I will use this to train for a marathon in 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: Great footwear
customer_reviews.text: Asics fan, my 5th pair. Replace once a year with daily wear
customer_reviews.author: Kris K

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Cushion insole is a little more firm than my older GT1000's but it fits and feels just right
customer_reviews.author: John Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: A solid sneaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good trainer and running sneaker. I work out 6 days a week and I only use the sneaker when working out. It has held up very well under those conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Comfortable! Asics is my go to shoe for all sports. They are always excellent quality and hold up as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS 1011A143 Men's GT-Xpress Running Shoe, Black/Neon Lime - 10 D(M) US
product_meta.description: The ASICS® GT-Xpress running shoe offers long-lasting durability and reliable support that will keep you moving in total comfort mile after mile. Predecessor: N/A. Support Type: Overpronation/Stability. Cushioning: High energizing cushioning/Lightweight, flexible response. Surface: Road. Differential: 10 mm. Heel/Toe: 22 mm/12 mm. Engineered mesh upper. Lace-up closure for a secure fit. Soft, plush tongue and collar. EVA sockliner offers long-lasting comfortable fit. Rearfoot GEL® cushioning systems attenuates impacting shock and allows for a smooth transition to midstance. EVA midsole provides excellent underfoot support and shock absorption. AHAR® is strategically placed throughout high-wear areas of the outsole. Guidance Line® technology employs a vertical flex groove that decouples the tooling along the line of progression for maximum stride efficiency. Guidance Trusstic System® integrates Guidance Line construction to enhance gait efficiency while promoting mid-foot structural integrity. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width 4E - Extra Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: The ASICS® GT-Xpress running shoe offers long-lasting durability and reliable support that will keep you moving in total comfort mile after mile.
Cushioning: High energizing cushioning/Lightweight, flexible response.
